content:
It's <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>! Ah, you must be tired from your journey!
I'm <color=#97c344>Sani</color>.
We met at the preparation department.

Anyway,
Mobai is waiting for you in front of the Camp,
ready to give everyone an <color=#97c344>Introduction to Life on the Astralink</color>.

Sorry about that sudden acceleration.
The Lumia around the world bubble became unstable.
I hope it didn't affect your first journey with everyone.
